text: Tini tomaderake srsti karechena eka'i byakti hate. Tarapara tini tara theke jora srsti karechena [1]. Ara tini tomadera jan'ya nayila karechena ata jora ana'ama [2]. Tini tomaderake tomadera matrgarbhera traibidha andhakare paryayakrame srsti karechena. Tini'i allaha; tomadera raba; sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i; tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i. Atahpara tomaderake kothaya phirano hacche
